context_text: <A> yeah well there are situations that come up that are just totally totally obvious to everyone that it was a deliberate cruel thing / <B> right / <A> and then there are other situations that come up that it in actuality was an accident / <B> right / <A> but there was a law like a child that wasn't fastened in their seat belt / <B> right / <A> everybody knows they're supposed to fasten those children in those seat belts / <B> right / <A> and when one does get killed it is involuntary manslaughter { but } / <B> [ right ] / <A> it was actually failure to belt buckle the seat belt / <B> right / <A> you know and morally which one is are there you know is the good lord gonna come down on em for you know / <B> right / <A> and sometimes i i you know i've seen a man on tv i don't know of any of the factual parts except what the tv said but where a man did just that his two year old was killed because it was not in a seat belt and he's in prison right now for mur or ah involuntary manslaughter i think they got him for / <B> right / <A> and that you know he should of done something for it but this man left a wife and three other children and he's in prison for like twenty five years / <B> right
